headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Syria's Assad on Aleppo, Siege and Airstrikes
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Syria's Assad on Aleppo, Siege and Airstrikes

docs.snippet: During an interview with The Associated Press, Syrian President Bashar Assad made several denials, insisting that the city of Aleppo is not under siege and that Syrian and Russian aircraft did not carry out a strike on an aid convoy. He also said ...
docs.lead_paragraph: During an interview with The Associated Press, Syrian President Bashar Assad made several denials, insisting that the city of Aleppo is not under siege and that Syrian and Russian aircraft did not carry out a strike on an aid convoy. He also said a U.S.-led coalition airstrike that killed more than 60 Syrian troops in the eastern Deir el-Zour province was "not an accident."

headline.main: Palestinians' Abbas Seeks British Apology for 1917 Jewish Homeland Declaration
headline.print_headline: Palestinians' Abbas Seeks British Apology for 1917 Jewish Homeland Declaration

docs.snippet: Britain should apologize for its 1917 declaration endorsing the  founding of a Jewish homeland in Palestine and should recognize Palestine as a state, Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain should apologize for its 1917 declaration endorsing the  founding of a Jewish homeland in Palestine and should recognize Palestine as a state, Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas said on Thursday.

headline.main: Satellite-Based Radar Confirms Man-Made Texas Earthquakes
headline.print_headline: Satellite-Based Radar Confirms Man-Made Texas Earthquakes

docs.snippet: Scientists used radar from satellites to show that five Texas earthquakes, one reaching magnitude 4.8, were caused by injections of wastewater in drilling for oil and gas....
docs.lead_paragraph: Scientists used radar from satellites to show that five Texas earthquakes, one reaching magnitude 4.8, were caused by injections of wastewater in drilling for oil and gas.

headline.main: Rusty Patched Bumble Bee Recommended for Endangered List
headline.print_headline: Rusty Patched Bumble Bee Recommended for Endangered List

docs.snippet: Federal wildlife officials on Thursday made a formal recommendation to list the rusty patched bumble bee as an endangered species because it has disappeared from about 90 percent of its historic range in just the past two decades....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal wildlife officials on Thursday made a formal recommendation to list the rusty patched bumble bee as an endangered species because it has disappeared from about 90 percent of its historic range in just the past two decades.

headline.main: Iran Calls Out Saudi Arabia at U.N.

docs.snippet: In his speech at the United Nations General Assembly, President Hassan Rouhani of Iran said Saudi Arabia must end "divisive policies" to create stability in the Middle East....

byline.original: By THOMAS ERDBRINK and NATALIA V. OSIPOVA

docs.lead_paragraph: In his speech at the United Nations General Assembly, President Hassan Rouhani of Iran said Saudi Arabia must end "divisive policies" to create stability in the Middle East.

headline.main: U.S. States' Sluggish Revenue Dims Outlook for Financial Year 2017 Budgets: Study
headline.print_headline: U.S. States' Sluggish Revenue Dims Outlook for Financial Year 2017 Budgets: Study

docs.snippet: Drooping U.S. state tax revenue in the first half of 2016 could put holes in the states' budgets for fiscal 2017, according to a report by the Rockefeller Institute of Government released on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Drooping U.S. state tax revenue in the first half of 2016 could put holes in the states' budgets for fiscal 2017, according to a report by the Rockefeller Institute of Government released on Thursday.

headline.main: Italian Team Arrives in Libya to Investigate Kidnappings
headline.print_headline: Italian Team Arrives in Libya to Investigate Kidnappings

docs.snippet: Libyan officials say a team of five Italian investigators has arrived in a town near the Algerian border where two Italians and a Canadian were abducted at gunpoint earlier this week....
docs.lead_paragraph: Libyan officials say a team of five Italian investigators has arrived in a town near the Algerian border where two Italians and a Canadian were abducted at gunpoint earlier this week.

headline.main: Fewer Chileans Living in Poverty Despite Economic Slowdown
headline.print_headline: Fewer Chileans Living in Poverty Despite Economic Slowdown

docs.snippet: Fewer Chileans were living in poverty despite weak economic growth in the world's leading copper producer, the government said on Thursday, noting that 11.7 percent of the population was below the poverty line in 2015 compared to 14.4 percent in 2...
docs.lead_paragraph: Fewer Chileans were living in poverty despite weak economic growth in the world's leading copper producer, the government said on Thursday, noting that 11.7 percent of the population was below the poverty line in 2015 compared to 14.4 percent in 2013.
